title: Are there something wrong with some legacy skins?
body: Hi guys, I just found out that like Sailor Gangplank(which I owned), and the legacy Pharaoh amumu skin (which my friend owned), they disappeared in the skin list, like I have never owned them.... can someone who has these skins check them out if you remember plz? I am kind of worried......

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We'd never take away content just because something was wrong with the skin - we'd just disable it if there was a bug. If you're missing content, I'd suggest checking out [this post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/gfX587IW-champsskins-i-was-gifted-are-gone-where-did-they-go). 

As it mentions, if you don't think the reasons listed are why you're missing content, please feel free to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
